page.title: 15NEWS
page.content: Extracts from the "Stratford Herald" "Man dies in pub blaze"_ The body of a pub landlord was pulled from the flames of his burning public house yesterday morning. "Baby shock for midwife"_ A Claverdon woman who had been told she could never have a child has given birth to a son at the age of 45. "Stop M40 bid fails "_ A big threat to the vital M40 link between Oxford and Birmingham has been removed by the loss of a high court action by anti-juggernaut campaigners. "Heart swap Air dash "_Wellesborne flying school was involved in a race against time on Sunday to get a human heart from a donor in Swansea. "County Council Chaos"_Ten Labour committee chairman resigned within three hours of taking office. Warks County Council left in chaos!
